alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 11:01PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of New London and northern Middlesex Counties through 1130 PM EST... At 1100 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from East Hampton to New London. Movement was northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jewett City, Norwich, New London, Colchester, East Hampton, Groton, Salem, Mystic, Waterford, East Lyme, Ledyard, Griswold, Portland, East Haddam and Lebanon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern New London
